articles.title: Asian shares rise as China cuts key mortgage rate - Reuters
articles.description: Asian share markets broke a five-day slide to edge higher on Thursday, shrugging off drops in Europe and on Wall Street overnight as China underscored its diverging monetary and economic picture by cutting benchmark mortgage rates.
articles.content: SHANGHAI, Jan 20 (Reuters) - Asian share markets broke a five-day slide to edge higher on Thursday, shrugging off drops in Europe and on Wall Street overnight as China underscored its diverging monet… [+4191 chars]

articles.title: Russian Military Buildup Triggers European Defense Anxieties - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: French President Emmanuel Macron takes helm of EU’s rotating presidency with a call for Europe to chart its own defense course aside from NATO

articles.title: UK PM Boris Johnson drops COVID-19 rules, says Omicron has peaked - Newshub
articles.description: "Many nations across Europe have endured further winter lockdowns... but this government took a different path."
articles.content:
Johnson said none of the so-called Plan B measures would remain in England when they lapse on Jan. 26, as face masks would not be legally enforced anywhere and COVID passes would not be mandatory.
